channel.title: Changing Currency
channel.description: I was wondering how you change currency in one specific shop. I am using a PI source called deathlypvpz V3 and V4 and deathlypvpz has these checks you can cash in for 2 bil. Well i want to put items in shops worth tickets instead od gold. So say if i put a phat into a shop and i want it to be worth 10 Bil. I would make it so that you could use 5 2bill tickets to purchase that phat. So basicly what i am asking is, is there anyway that in some shops i could use tickets items instead of gold.

item.title: Changing Currency
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:2, topic:523860”]Yes.
Google will help finding a tut[/quote]
Says the kid that posts questions that could be answered on google…

[quote=“xXSh0ckXx, post:3, topic:523860”][quote author=u loose link=topic=642404.msg4325932#msg4325932 date=1372907988]
Yes.
Google will help finding a tut
[/quote]
Lmfao give him the link to the tut atleast, dont try to get your post count up with this

Edit: sorry forgot to give you a hint

Take this as an example http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/324907-pi-making-shops-accept-points-rather-than-money.html[/quote]
We don’t have to give him a link if we don’t want…

Pwninangel:

Thanks!

If you have issues post here.

Read full topic
